Chinese Definition:
①水中沙堆，引申爲沙漠：沙磧。磧礫。磧鹵(鹹鹵沙石之地)。

磧字的基本解释

磧
qì
见“碛”。

磧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qì］
［《廣韻》七迹切，入昔，清。］
“碛1”的繁体字。
(1)浅水中的沙石；沙石浅滩。
(2)急流。
(3)沙漠。

磧字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　磧； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页835第38
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?七迹切，音皵。【說文】水陼有石者。【水經注】佷子潭有石磧州，長六十丈，廣十八丈。【司馬相如·上林賦】下磧歷之坻。【註】磧歷，淺水中沙石也。【韻會】吳楚謂之瀨，中國謂之磧。　又沙漠亦曰磧。【杜甫·送人從軍詩】今君渡沙磧，絫月斷人烟。　【正字通】或讀戚責二音，義同。

磧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

moraine
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　碛; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 835 to 38
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Seven traces cut, sound 皵. [Said the text] There are stones in the water. [Shuijing Note] There is Shiqizhou in Nizitan, with a length of sixty meters and a width of eighteen meters. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】The spine of the Xiaqi calendar. [Note] Moraine calendar, sand and stone in shallow water. [Rhyme Club] Wu Chu is called "Se," and China is called "Ji".　The desert is also called moraine. [Du Fu·Send People to the Army Poem] Today, the monarch crosses the sand moraine, and the moon is dead.　【Zhengzitong】Or read the two syllables of Qi and Li, with the same meaning.
